alert.note: Alert for Pike; Walthall (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 12:59AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Tangipahoa and northwestern Washington Parishes, southwestern Walthall and southern Pike Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1259 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Kentwood, or 13 miles northeast of Greensburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Franklinton, Kentwood, Tylertown, Osyka, Mount Herman and Tangipahoa. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 55 and 66. Interstate 55 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
